Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @channel, My scanner shows that 58 ransom files are active, well done everybody, I think we've bombed the whole place
Yeah, that's supposed to be all of them
Now what do we do?
We'll wait. I notified the client. Waiting for further instructions
Will that attract Omicron?
Most probably
We can kill them all right now if you want to attract everybody's attention, including Omicron
Then do it
Whoa, we still may get some cash out of them first
You said that Omicron pays generous, you need him as much as I do. Kill them
I am interested in seeing that Omicron guy as well so why the fuck not?
Anybody else wants to support Vortex's initiative?
I am curious about a partnership with a legend
I heard he got some beautiful tools and programs extracted directly from EnTech archives
Prophet? What is your opinion?
He is in a major league. At least he was. He can teach us how to strike FBI and get away with it. So I am voting for Vortex
Then the decision is made
!ANNOUNCEMENT! HaHaTrap SCRIPT ACTIVATED @channel
@Deladello, scan all mass media about what we've done, I want every single person in California to know what happened
We made this week's top news, lads
Nice! I contacted client, he already saw the news, and he is more than happy actually
Apperantly he can lobe his medical project now
Great, I hope we can benefit from it as well
So what's next?
We are now notorious hackers, gentlemen
And I can see a lot of opportunities ahead of us
I hope we will get some kind of contact from
